headline: AIG (AIG) Margin Win Reinforces Bullish Narrative, but Forecast Growth Lags Broader Market
summary: American International Group (AIG) posted a net profit margin of 11.9%, up from last year’s 8%, and grew earnings by 50.8% in the past year, well above its five-year average of 8.1%. With high-quality earnings, an attractive dividend, and a price-to-earnings ratio of 12.7x that undercuts the US insurance sector average, AIG’s $76.32 share price remains below an estimated fair value of $141.69, reinforcing a value case for the stock. However, with projected annual revenue growth of 4.4% and...
